page.title: 06Science and Technology
page.content: On the western edge of the block is an observatory, which is owned and operated by the University of Sheffield. It has a reflector telescope as well as a small radio-telescope dish and is used to further research into the nature of the universe. Also, Sheffield University has an animal research establishment on a nearby site. In what used to be Mayfield school, Sheffield Education Authority have set up a rural studies centre which can be used as a base for groups of school-children from all over the city to use in their enviromental and rural studies courses. Pioneer work on spinal injuries is a feature of activities of Lodge Moor Hospital
